comments:
While debugging, examining the contents of a collection in the variables view
with "show logical structure" turned on usually allows me to look at two or
three values, then all subsequent attemts displays only the string "<error
occurred retrieving value>". The following error is reported in the Errors view:

==

Clicking on another view (that hides the variables view) and then returning to
it seems to "reset" the state, but it then fails again quickly. 

The proble seems to be time related - if I quickly click from one value to the
next, they display ok, but if I wait too long the values are no longer available.

Same problem as 33452 - the logical strucutres feature creates temporary 
objects on the target that can be garbage collected.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 33452 ***
